;

;"Serial Strategy·Small Banquet" was performed on the ancient stage of Zhaoming Academy when it was dark ;;

;

;On October 19, 2023, the 10th Wuzhen Theater Festival opened. I can’t remember how many carnival performances I happened upon at the Wuzhen Theater Festival last year and this year. Chance encounters here are very common. Carnival performance venues are mostly on Xizha Street, the main street of Xizha, as well as under bridges, in pavilions, and in awning boats. There are hundreds of performances including improvisational drama, physical drama, opera, and dance in ten days.

;

;Just like last year, more than one performance team stood on stilts and wore costumes, slowly setting off from the hall of Zhaoming Academy for a parade. But this year, six rows of spectators were packed into the narrow Xizha Street (;a stone road that usually only allows three people to walk abreast;) . The actor on stilts headed west, followed by a group of people, and a group of people took advantage of the traffic jam to ease and walked in the opposite direction.

;

;;

;

;Young heroes competing near Yudu Bridge

;

;I was on the road several times because of the traffic jam caused by too many passers-by watching the carnival performances. I was almost late, but this time The excitement makes people lose their temper.

;

;Farewell to the first team of stilt walkers, I met the second team of stilt walkers at the bridge end of Lingshui Street. A man and a woman both wore armor and wielded spears. They seemed to be young heroes. A dwarf (;In the world of stilts, real people are considered dwarves;), drew his sword to fight against two guns. The audience applauded.

;

;Many people like to wear ancient costumes and take pictures this year, including Wuzhen. I am even more confused as to whether this was also the case for people visiting temple fairs in ancient times.

;

;;

;

;The actor who plays the scheming clown

;

;When Ding Naizhu, the chief planner of the Wuzhen Theater Festival, promoted the ancient town carnival, he said, "There are all kinds of life and drama, and you can be the audience. , you can also blend into it." Last year, the Wuzhen Theater Festival was held at the end of November, when the new coronavirus epidemic prevention policy was the most stringent. This year, at least four times as many tourists as last year entered Xizha, and the audience was more closely connected with the carnival performances.

;

;Including this pair of heroes, there are three acting spots in a row under the Yudu Bridge. The audience formed a circle outside each point, and the three circles were crowded together, almost intersecting. I stood on the bridge and watched. Not far away, the heroes of the contest were performing a physical drama. There were two or three chairs, a piece of white cloth, and several Rose petals constitute the entire performance field. The actors and actresses cover the chairs with white cloth, scatter rose petals, spin in circles, look at each other, push down the chairs, and do not speak. They use these actions to express their emotional changes.

;

;;

;

;Carnival actors running on Xizha Street

;

;Another person with a lot of interaction was the Wooden Box Theater Company. The second time I passed by, I stopped to watch their improvisation. comedy. The rules are as follows: one actor acts as the guesser and goes to the other side to hide far away. The other actors listen to the audience's instructions. The audience assigns roles and quirks, and the actors improvise.

;

;"Killer!" Someone said the loudest.

;

;Okay, play the killer. Next comes fetishes. "Dance the girl group dance!"

;

;At this time, the guessing actor was called back, and his companion performed a killer who danced the girl group dance, and he had to guess. If you don't guess correctly, the audience can boo.

;

;;

;

;The environmental experimental drama "Centaur 2023" by the bridge was a little quiet in the second half

;

;There are many such interactive carnival performances this year. For example, two clowns handed out red and white balloon sticks, dividing the audience into red and white teams. The children were very enthusiastic. The white team's clown exaggeratedly replaced the red team's clown's balloon. The little boys and girls (;their parents dressed them up as young masters and ladies in ancient times;) did not have stage fright, and followed the white clown to tease the red clown. Play.

;

;One day I rushed to the Sun and Moon Square to interview the theater director who was preparing for the rehearsal. The square was occupied by three tall Russian performers and several rows of spectators. It seemed very exciting. During the interview, I could still hear the sound of the organ and the clapping and cheering of the tourists. I passed here again at the same time the next day, and sure enough I caught three Eastern Europeans, dressed in steampunk costumes. One played the organ, one played the clarinet, and one played the drums. Each of them had a flexible rotating lamp above his head that could be turned on ( ;I don’t understand the meaning of this design;).

;

;The performance lasted for about twenty minutes. At several points in the middle, the three people introduced themselves or communicated with the audience. There was no translation, and no one present probably understood it, but everyone had a tacit understanding, and the Eastern Europeans spoke in the same way. After a while, everyone cheered and applauded without hesitation.

;

;Some are also very classical.

;

;;

;

;Beside the river outside Lingshuiju, there is a carnival installation that lights up at night

;

;Two times at the ancient stage of Zhaoming Academy, I stopped and listened to the sea "Lianlian Ji·Small Banquet" by Fengxian Xiqin Opera Art Inheritance Center. When the sky was getting dark, on the stage on one side of Zhaoming Academy, under the introduction of Situ Wang Yun, Lu Bu met the eighteen-year-old Diao Chan. Lu Bu asked Diao Chan why she wasn't married yet? Diao Chan waved her water sleeve, and Lu Bu gently held a corner of the water sleeve, pretending to be a wine glass with his hand, swiping back and forth on the water sleeve, and drank the contents of the cup in one gulp. In order to take the bait, the hands, eyes, body and steps are all interesting.

;

;Zhaoming Academy was built to commemorate Xiao Tong, the prince of Liang Dynasty in the Southern Dynasties. The inner courtyard was expanded and became the venue for many performances at the Wuzhen Carnival.

;

;By coincidence, I watched "Bosom Friend" twice in Zhaoming Academy one day, and both times I only saw the second half, Boya's one-man show: it was an adaptation of Boya Ziqi's story, Academy In the open space, there is a guqin and a singing bowl.

;

;;

;

;During the Wuzhen Theater Festival, posters of specially invited plays were posted on the exterior walls of houses, and tourists took photos with their children

;

;Bo Ya was wearing a red robe and a white silk ribbon , sometimes facing the sky, sometimes holding arms, shouting, Ziqi, Ziqi! A tourist holding a child answered and said, Ziqi is here, here!

;

;When the actors took their final call, Ziqi appeared. I realized that Ziqi was the person who sat across from me at lunch an hour ago. He was wearing a white robe and a red ribbon, and he matched Bo Ya perfectly.

;

;I wanted to take a break in the afternoon, so I sat down at a riverside cafe. When I looked up, I saw Ziqi again on the bridge. The white robe and red silk were very eye-catching. The editor and I were discussing work. After more than ten minutes, I looked up and saw that Ziqi was still on the bridge and someone was taking pictures of him. At this time, two tourists sat down next to me. One said, "I'm looking at the scenery under the bridge, and the people watching the scenery are looking at you on the bridge, right?" "What?" replied the other. The previous speaker pointed to Zi Qi, "I remember this saying, right?" At this time, Zi Qi got off the bridge, as if he was going to watch a performance on the other side of the river.

; Sun, 12 Nov 2023 13:25:04 +0800 刘润“翻车”后左支右绌：“商业战略大师”到底是门什么生意？http://www.infzm.com/contents/260450
;;2023-11-12 12:00:00;
;

;The famous business consultant Liu Run "overturned" and broke the circle due to what happened on October 28, 2023 A statement from an annual speech given. Liu Run said in his speech that it took three years for brand discount MAMA stores to open 2,500 stores across the country, with total revenue exceeding 1.7 billion. This set of data has been questioned by many parties.

;

;Ma Xintong, the founder of Discount Niu, posted a video on Douyin, saying that according to the public statement of the founder of Discount MAMA, the brand should have 20 to 30 stores in September this year, and the annual turnover should be It's less than 100 million. Some netizens questioned in the comments, "1.7 billion, 2,500 stores, each store sells about 680,000 yuan a year on average? And where are these 2,500 stores mainly opened?"

;

;Liu Run repeatedly explained, saying that "there are explanations in the speech and in the full text" "these 2,500 stores include self-operated stores, co-branded stores and stores supported by the supply chain" "this number has been confirmed by Xing Yunfei himself" ". MAMA founder Xing Yunfei also responded that discount MAMA has 4,000+ stores nationwide supported by direct operations, joint operations, and supply chain hosting.

;

;Liu Run even published a report titled "Liu Run: 2,700 stores, 1.7 billion, discount MAMA's data. Is it fiction?" "The article, "It doesn't matter if you use my traffic, but you have misled many sincere entrepreneurs" caused more dissatisfaction.

;

;After much hesitation, Liu Run finally issued an apology letter on Weibo on November 2, admitting several mistakes. The storm is over.

;

;In fact, Liu Run's mistake in his annual speech was very obvious. As he finally admitted, the so-called "2,500 stores" were not opened by MAMA, but most of them were MAMA "services" business partners. If business partners such as upstream and downstream supply chains and co-branding are included in the stores opened by brands, how many more "unicorn" companies will China need to add? What's even more ironic is that according to the water injection standard for cooperation, the data given by Xing Yunfei is more than 4,000, indicating that the "2,500" mentioned in Liu Run's speech is also very inaccurate. Could it be a compromise of "fuzzy processing"? There should not be such low-level data errors in the annual speeches of business consulting professionals.

;

;You shouldn’t make simple mistakes, and you shouldn’t admit it in time when you are wrong. People can not escape from doing wrong. If you can change your past, there is no greater good. Admit it openly when you are wrong and then give a reasonable explanation. This is the most basic principle of crisis public relations. Liu Run did not do this. It may not be because he does not understand, but because the "Internet celebrity" business model of establishing a personality and generating traffic caused deformation of his actions. Business consulting business cannot do this, but "Internet celebrity" traffic business must do this.

;

;Since the rise of the Internet, a group of Internet celebrity "business consultants" or so-called "business strategy gurus" have emerged. Their resumes are as bright as a crucian carp crossing a river. Liu Run is one of the representative figures. However, the business model of these "business consultants" is very different from the traditional business consulting industry.

;

;The "business consultants" who are active online are IP-based and media-based, and are keen on the "to C" business of mass communication, rather than the "to B" business of traditional business consulting agencies serving enterprises. For example, Liu Run's title includes strategic consultants for many large companies, but it is difficult for the public to understand how much he has contributed to the strategic optimization of these companies, and how much he and his business team have gained from these corporate consulting services. revenue.

;

;Liu Run’s most eye-catching business achievement is the huge income that expensive online courses and even more expensive offline courses have brought him. The prospectus of Thinking Creation, the parent company of "Get", Liu Run's main sales platform, shows that Liu Run has appeared in "Get"'s major procurement contracts for four consecutive years starting in 2017. From 2017 to 2020, Liu Run received a total of 58 million in online and offline course revenue. Liu Run’s IP has become a high-quality “obtained” asset.

;

;It is difficult to evaluate Liu Run's career using traditional business consulting standards. What is certain is that Liu Run is a very successful Internet content producer and an "Internet celebrity" with high IP value. The "business consultants" who are active on the Internet today are basically in this situation. It is difficult to see how successful their consulting business is. The content dissemination channel of paid knowledge is the main source of revenue. Of course, traditional business consulting also earns training fees, but this is not how the courses are sold, and the audience is not so "taught but not differentiated".

;

;The service targets of traditional business consulting organizations are very limited. Small and medium-sized organizations are usually only responsible for a few long-term customers, and large organizations only have dozens or hundreds of long-term customers. Their services require constant performance appraisal from customers, and every "golden idea", every special report, and every training class must be of practical help to business operations. The traffic of "business consultants" in the hundreds of thousands or millions means that the audience is huge and the actual performance is difficult to measure. No one can count how many "students" who bought courses have gained business benefits from the wise words of the "business consultant".

;

;If this kind of content creation and dissemination must be classified as a business consulting industry, it can only be said that the training branch of the business consulting industry is moving toward a "sinking market." The audience is huge, the good and the bad are mixed, and the specific scenarios vary widely. It is impossible to provide customized services like the traditional business consulting industry. The communication effect is the goal of this sinking market. This "sinking market" competes for traffic, not service performance. Therefore, the primary means of competition is presentation skills rather than actual performance in furthering the commercial interests of the audience. The macro narrative is gorgeous, the micro is chicken soup for the soul, new concepts and golden sentences fly together, and the words are not surprising, all in order to attract more fans and gain more traffic.

;

;The behavior patterns of "business consultants" and "business strategy masters" are closer to other "Internet celebrities" who do traffic business than to traditional business consulting agencies. Like all internet celebrities, they must always give top priority to maintaining their personality and traffic base. Traditional business consulting agencies have neither such "traffic pressure" nor room for prevarication and confusion - customers are all experts and are not easy to fool. Even if you fool around for a while, it will be in vain if there is a performance problem in the end.

;

;In short, the "business consultants" who are active on the Internet are not the networking of the business consulting industry, but the Internet celebrityization of business culture communication. “Internet celebrity” itself is not a derogatory connotation. Used correctly, it can improve the efficiency of information dissemination and help popularize knowledge and ideas. However, if used incorrectly, it will become the starting point for a decline in industry standards and a decline in professional ethics. Liu Run made low-level mistakes first and refused to admit his mistakes later. He can be classified as the latter.

;

;As an emerging industry in the Internet era, "business consultants" must be tolerant and willing to see results, but they also need to be vigilant and learn from each experience.

;

;This incident is a warning to the "business consultant" industry. There is nothing wrong with spreading business culture, but don’t overly elevate your industry positioning. Most of them are content producers who disseminate business knowledge to the public. Why bother with the "sheep head" of "business consulting"? Micro business scenarios vary widely, and market segments are diverse. Even if you have the power to penetrate the universe, how many users can you provide consulting services to? The bluff of forcibly creating IP and selling characters goes against the spirit of business.

;

;For consumers who pay for knowledge, this incident is also a reminder. If two to three hundred yuan of course money can buy you the secrets of getting rich that can change your destiny, how can there be any poor people in the world? Consume rationally and choose carefully.

;

;There are also those large companies that have so many "strategic consultants" that they can't even remember them. They should cherish their famous products. If you don’t want to be fooled, don’t let others use it to fool others.

;

;;•;;（ This article is only the author's personal opinion and does not represent the position of this newspaper);

;Monitoring data from the State Post Bureau show that from November 1 to 11, 2023, postal express delivery companies across the country collected a total of There were 5.264 billion express parcels, a year-on-year increase of 23.22%, and the average daily business volume was 1.4 times the usual business volume. On November 11, a total of 639 million express parcels were received, which was 1.87 times the daily business volume and a year-on-year increase of 15.76%.

;

;Bian Zuodong, deputy director of the Market Supervision Department of the State Post Bureau, said that this year’s peak season for express delivery business mainly presents two peaks, which are more stable, supporting consumption recovery, economic improvement, and user experience is more convenient. Big features. This year's express business peak season will continue to form two peaks on November 1 and November 11, sharing the pressure of the industry at a single peak and making the operation more stable. Postal express delivery is deeply integrated with e-commerce, modern agriculture, modern manufacturing, etc. During the "Double 11" period, the entire network's collection volume hit a record high, reflecting the vitality of my country's consumer market and a vivid portrayal of the economic recovery. Postal express delivery is deeply integrated into the e-commerce industry chain. A large number of pre-sale goods are pre-stored in the express cloud warehouse, making delivery services faster and more accurate.

;

;He said that this year’s express delivery business peak season will start on November 1 and end on the eve of the Spring Festival in 2024. In order to do a good job in ensuring service during peak seasons, the State Post Bureau has formulated a guarantee plan based on full situation analysis and service capability assessment with major e-commerce platforms and delivery companies, and comprehensively deployed and implemented it, coordinating e-commerce platforms and delivery companies to continue to play " The core mechanism of "staggered shipment and balanced promotion". At the same time, we will carry out in-depth investigation and rectification of potential safety hazards to ensure production safety, delivery safety, and information security in an all-round way, and prevent casualties in the industry; adhere to the standardization, recycling, reduction, and harmlessness of express packaging, and encourage e-commerce express shipments to be sent directly with original packaging , Reduce excessive front-end packaging.

;

;During peak business seasons and under low-temperature, rainy and snowy weather conditions, front-line couriers work for long hours, with heavy loads and high pressure. To this end, the postal management department continues to strengthen the care and care work of grassroots employees, safeguard the legitimate rights and interests of the courier group, and issues consumer tips, calling on users to give more tolerance and understanding to the courier group.

; Sun, 12 Nov 2023 11:25:03 +0800 圣药丨本草物色http://www.infzm.com/contents/260208
;;2023-11-12 11:00:00;
;

;;

;

;Boiled donkey hide gelatin. ;(Visual China/Picture);

;

;Donkey-hide gelatin, known as the "Three Treasures" along with ginseng and deer antlers, has unquestionable unparalleled popularity. It is widely rumored that the famous doctor Ye Tianshi, who once used Wutong leaves as a medicine introduction, said that donkey-hide gelatin is a product of flesh and blood and is the most nourishing. The so-called products of flesh and blood, that is, animal medicine, were highly regarded by Ye.

;

;Donkey-hide gelatin is the glue produced in Adi, and the named region is a classic label for authentic medicinal materials. Tao Hongjing broke the topic: It came out of Dong'e, so it was named donkey-hide gelatin. Li Shizhen refined and extended: Ajing is located sixty miles northeast of today's Yanggu County, Yanzhou Prefecture, Shandong Province, which is the ancient Dong'a County. There are official residences that prohibit it.

;

;The talented scholar Cao Zhi moved to fiefdoms many times during his lifetime, and Dong'a was his last stop before King Chen. After his death, he was buried in the local Yushan in accordance with his last wishes.

;

;The so-called official residence prohibits it, which reveals the qualification of donkey-hide gelatin as an official tribute tribute. There is a "Shui Jing Zhu" that can be endorsed: (Dong'e) On the west side of the north gate of the big city, there is a big well on Gao Shang. It is as big as a wheel and six or seven feet deep. It is used to cook glue every year and pay tribute to the heaven. "Compendium of Materia Medica" calls donkey hide gelatin. Therefore, it has the name of Ajing in the secular world.

;

;According to Li Shizhen's description, the Ajing water used for cooking glue was injected with Jishui. Use it to boil glue, and use it to stir the turbid water to make it clear. Therefore, Geji water is clear and heavy, and its nature tends to be downward. The so-called heavyness lies in the richness of minerals it contains. It is said that each pound of Ajing water is about 3 pounds heavier than ordinary well water and river water. It seems that boiling glue is like making wine, and living water with natural texture plays a considerable role.

;

;The "Compendium of Materia Medica" mentioned by Li Daoyuan is the "Shen Nong's Materia Medica". The origin of "Compendium of Materia Medica" is recorded in it, which shows the antiquity of donkey-hide gelatin production.

;

;As for the raw material of boiled glue, "Famous Doctors" says that it is made from boiled cowhide. In other words, donkey-hide gelatin in this era was originally cowhide. Li Shizhen pointed out that those using cow, buffalo and donkey skins were the top ones, followed by those using pig, horse, mule and ostrich skins, and those using various old skins, shoes and other items were the bottom. Most of the ancient recipes used cowhide, but later generations used donkey skin. As for the reason for this change, Chen Zangqi explained that all kinds of glues are mainly responsible for wind, antidiarrheal, and tonifying deficiency, and donkey skin is the most important for wind.

;

;Of course, the replacement of cattle and donkeys should also be related to the fact that cattle are the main livestock power in farming and even military resources, so they are strictly controlled by the government. Qin law had strict laws that stipulated that those who killed cows and horses would die. Although later dynasties no longer required beheading, they still had to bear criminal responsibility. For example, Tang law stipulated that even if you kill your own cattle, you will be sentenced to one year in prison.

;

;The donkey, with its trimmed tail and drooping back, and its giant ears and two gongs, is regarded by the Central Plains people as a rare animal of the Xiongnu. According to Gu Yanwu's "Rizhilu", since the Qin Dynasty and above, donkeys have not been seen in written records, even if they exist. Be an unusual animal. "The donkey is an object. It was named after the Han Dynasty. It was filial to the martial arts and found its way into the forest. It was filial and spiritual and was honored. However, its species mostly came from outside the fortress." Probably during the Han Dynasty, donkeys "entered the fortress with their tails attached." "They are all our animals." From the appreciation of Shanglin's strange beasts, they can be used as livestock for transportation. They are resistant to extensive diseases and easy to drive. They are strong in disease resistance and have early maturity and longevity. They also win in the cost-effectiveness trade-off and win the favor of both the government and the private sector. The poet's descriptions of "riding a donkey into the sword gate in the drizzle" and "the poetry of the sky and the sea are carried on the back of a donkey" vaguely reveal the relationship between donkeys and literati.

;

;When it comes to the use of donkey skin as medicine, it should be after its mass breeding. In addition to the use of donkeys for servitude, eating meat and sleeping on their hides is an appropriate meaning in the title, and tanning and making rubber are also included in the title. As for the uses of glue, Tao Hongjing pointed out that there are three types of glue: clear and thin glue used by painters; clear and thick glue called potting glue and used for medicinal purposes; turbid and black glue not used for medicine, but can be used to glue things.

;

;The so-called donkey skin is the most popular, which is the conclusion of the Tang Dynasty. As late as the Northern Song Dynasty, the donkey hide gelatin made from black donkey skin and boiled in well water was recognized as the best. In the view of strict medical practitioners, outside Dong'a, there is only donkey gelatin but no donkey-hide gelatin. However, due to the exclusivity of tributes and the official ban on Ajing, ceiling-level real glue is extremely rare. Most of the goods sold among the people are forged horsehide, old leather, saddle boots, etc., which smell foul and cannot be used as medicine.

;

;Although counterfeit medicines have been condemned, they have never disappeared. As a doctor with a benevolent heart, Li Shizhen is considerate and considerate. The yellow color is as transparent as amber, or the light and black color is as black as lacquer. The true one does not have stinky skin, and the summer moon is not wet and soft.

;

;The prototype of Mr. Bai Qiye, played by Mr. Chen Baoguo in the drama "The Mansion Gate", is Le Jingyu, the young master of Tongrentang. Mr. Lelao came to Jinan that year and founded Hongjitang. The donkey-hide gelatin he produced was known as the Nine Tips and Nine Roasts: peeling off the hair at the winter solstice, starting from the awakening of the stings, using copper pots and silver shovels, burning mulberry firewood, nine tips and nine moxibustions, and taking the ointment at nine days. There are ninety-nine processes, complicated but not many. The vernal equinox is exposed to the sun and the beginning of summer becomes glue. This is the path of Gongjiao.

;

;Li Shizhen’s explanation is more concise: When making all kinds of glue, from October to February or March... all raw skins are taken, soaked in water for four or five days, washed and scraped extremely clean. Boil, stir it from time to time, and add water constantly. When it is rotten, filter the juice and boil it into glue, pour it into a pot and wait for it to solidify. The glue that is close to the pelvic floor is called jiaojiao, and the glue that is salty and bitter is better when fried.

;

;As for the time line of glue making, "Qi Min Yao Shu" also said that it takes February, March, September and October to cook glue, and the remaining months are not enough. The reason why it is not successful is that if it is hot, it will not coagulate, and it will not make cakes; if it is cold, it will freeze and become sticky, and the glue will not stick.

;

;Not only is the preparation complicated, but also the preparation of the medicine is quite difficult. Tao Hongjing said: Whatever is used, it must be burned with fire. Lei Jiao, known as Thunder God, said: For any use, first soak it in pig fat overnight, take it out, dry it with willow wood and grind it before use. Li Shizhen divided and conquered it: the current method is to stir-fry pearls, stir-fry with flour, stir-fry, stir-fry with clam powder, stir-fry with grass ash, turn into ointment with wine, or hydrate the ointment, each should be based on its own prescription.

;

;The most famous effect of donkey-hide gelatin is to harmonize blood, nourish yin, remove wind and moisturize dryness. As Li Shizhen said, donkey-hide gelatin basically only replenishes blood and fluids, so it can clear the lungs, nourish yin and cure various syndromes. In addition, he pointedly mentioned that dysentery is often caused by excessive heat, and donkey-hide gelatin is an important medicine for the large intestine. Those with heat and toxin retention can be relieved; those without heat and toxin retention can be safe. From this, he regarded donkey-hide gelatin as a holy medicine and made it a god.

;

;This classic classifies donkey-hide gelatin as a top-grade medicine, that is, it is a royal medicine that "maintains life and responds to the sky, is non-toxic, and does not hurt people if taken for a long time." Although not all top-quality products are the best, donkey-hide gelatin is indeed comparable to ginseng and licorice, and is worthy of its god-like existence.

;Currently, the situation of telecommunications network fraud crimes involving China in northern Myanmar is severe, the social harm is serious, and the people have reacted strongly. Investigation by the Wenzhou City Public Security Bureau in Zhejiang Province revealed that Ming Xuechang, Ming Guoping, Ming Julan, and Ming Zhenzhen are important leaders of a criminal group involved in telecommunications network fraud in the Kokang Autonomous Region in northern Myanmar. The criminal group headed by Ming Xuechang has organized and opened fraud for a long time. The den is open to armed fraud and carries out telecommunications and network fraud criminal activities targeting Chinese citizens. The amount of fraud is huge. Under the severe and high-pressure situation of the public security organs, it still does not restrain or stop, and continues to organize and carry out illegal and criminal activities. At the same time, it is suspected of intentional homicide. , intentional injury, illegal detention and other serious violent crimes, the circumstances are extremely bad and the consequences are extremely serious.

;

;It has been found that the criminal facts of Ming Xuechang, Ming Guoping, Ming Julan and Ming Zhenzhen are clear and the evidence is conclusive. The Wenzhou Municipal Public Security Bureau of Zhejiang Province has decided to issue a public reward for their arrest. The public security organs urged the four criminal suspects Ming Xuechang, Ming Guoping, Ming Julan, and Ming Zhenzhen to recognize the situation clearly, step back from the brink, voluntarily surrender themselves, and strive for leniency. At the same time, we hope that all walks of life and the general public will actively report the crime and assist in the arrest of criminal suspects. For those who provide effective clues and assist in arrests, the public security organs will reward RMB 100,000 to RMB 500,000.

;

;Fragrant pig race April 28, 2014, Yiwei Town, Tiandong County, Guangxi< span style="color: #aaa;">;(Xie Peixia/Photo);

;

;The Zhuang people have a tradition of worshiping gods. There are three great creation gods in their folklore. In addition to the Thunder King and the Dragon King, there is also the old man Buluotuo who knows all things. In addition, the worship of nature has also derived many objects that can be sacrificed, such as mountain gods and land gods.

;

;;

;

;Firecracker competition on April 10, 2011, Baiyu Town, Tianyang County, Guangxi;(Xie Peixia/Photo);< /p>;

;In order to worship the gods, people gathered together to perform ritual songs and dances. With the development of the times, the original sacrificial singing and dancing gradually turned into a group singing fair activity. During March and April of the lunar calendar, or between August and September, when the weather is suitable in spring and autumn, people put down their farm work and sing in open places. Young men and women use singing to choose their spouses, and middle-aged and elderly people compete with each other and enjoy songs. Everyone and every family can enjoy the song fair, and the large-scale national event has shifted from "entertaining gods" to "entertaining people".

;

;;

;

;Stilt walking competition on April 28, 2014, Yiwei Town, Tiandong County, Guangxi ;(Xie Peixia/Photo);

;

;Song fairs are generally popular in Zhuang areas. In 1983, the People's Government of the Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region made a decision to designate the third day of the third lunar month as the Zhuang Song Festival. However, in Tiandong, Tianyang and other places in Baise City, there were dozens or even hundreds of song fairs a year at their peak. In recent years, due to young people going out to work, the number of song fairs has gradually decreased. In some areas, after the old singers quit, there are no young and middle-aged singers to take over, and the song fairs can only be suspended.

;

;;

;

;Wrestling match on Little Tomatoes, April 4, 2017, Baiyu Town, Tianyang County, Guangxi;(Xie Peixia/Picture);

;

;如何让歌圩在当下更好地延续？百色市田东县在全县10个乡镇倡导“一镇一节”。这一次，歌圩从庆祝宽泛的节日转向关注自己的生活。歌圩不仅仅只是对唱山歌，还能放得下各种民间娱乐活动，抛绣球、碰彩蛋、抢花炮等。竞技性在其次，更重要的是有趣，吸引人参与，让乡镇发掘属于自己的特色活动，更能激起人们参与的热情。

;

;;

;

;徒手剥玉米比赛2012年3月11日，广西田阳县那满镇;（谢佩霞/图）;

;

;义圩镇盛产香猪，2014年起，镇里在农历三月的歌圩上举行香猪赛跑。香猪在前面跑，主人用绳子牵着在后面赶。猪只管跑，人的情绪要兴奋得多，观众的呐喊声和欢笑声淹没了整条街。

;

;田东县是中国芒果之乡，进行大规模芒果种植的祥周镇想出芒果主题的竞技，妇女们用勺子托住芒果，来回运送，先将箩筐里的芒果全部运至终点者获胜。

;

;;

;

;打陀螺比赛2014年3月17日，广西南丹县里湖瑶族乡;（谢佩霞/图）;

;

;有的镇以小西红柿作为主要农作物，举行挑西红柿比赛，夫妻双方接力挑西红柿，用时最短者获胜。场面最好看的是小西红柿上的摔跤。摔跤池里填满了小西红柿，摔跤手互相角逐，稍不注意就会踩着小西红柿滑倒，浑身沾满红色的果汁。

;

;;

;

;贴鼻子比赛2016年2月8日，广西田东县平马镇;（谢佩霞/图）;

;

;歌圩转变的背后，是乡村产业的振兴。以往村里没有产业，人们背井离乡外出务工。当歌圩随着产业一同回归，年轻人又回到老家。

; Sat, 11 Nov 2023 22:55:03 +0800 甘肃平凉一小学校长奸淫多名学生被执行死刑？当地回应：属实http://www.infzm.com/contents/260442
;;2023-11-11 22:26:47;
;

;近日，一份抬头为“甘肃省平凉市中级人民法院”的布告引发网络关注，内文显示平凉市静宁县某小学校长张隆基强奸、当众猥亵多名学生，于11月7日被执行死刑。 11月11日，当地政府办公室工作人员向南都记者证实，此布告确系平凉市中级人民法院所发，该院此前曾审理此案。

;

;;

;

;法院布告。

;

;据平凉中院布告，张隆基，男，汉族，1979年2月24日出生于甘肃省静宁县，大学文化。 2010年至2019年6月，其在静宁县某小学历任教导主任、校长兼教师期间，通过体罚等手段，对缺乏性防卫能力的小学生形成精神挟制，利用讲解习题、学生交作业等机会，在其宿舍内多次对5名时年8～12岁的幼女实施奸淫，在教室内当众或在其宿舍里，多次对17名时年8～14岁的儿童实施猥亵。平凉中院依法判决张隆基犯强奸罪，判处死刑，剥夺政治权利终身；犯猥亵儿童罪，判处有期徒刑十年。数罪并罚，决定执行死刑，剥夺政治权利终身。

;

;案件宣判后，张隆基曾提出上诉，被甘肃省高级人民法院驳回，维持死刑原判，并由最高人民法院核准。今年11月7日，平凉中院遵照最高人民法院院长签发的执行死刑命令，将张隆基验明正身，押赴刑场，注射执行死刑。

;

;南都记者了解到，《刑法》第二百三十六条规定，奸淫不满十四周岁幼女的，以强奸论，从重处罚。强奸妇女、奸淫幼女多人的，情节恶劣的，或在公共场所当众的，处十年以上有期徒刑、无期徒刑或者死刑。今年5月25日，最高人民法院、最高人民检察院联合发布了《关于办理强奸、猥亵未成年人刑事案件适用法律若干问题的解释》，重申坚持“严”字当头、从严惩处的司法理念，对相关从重、加重处罚条款作了进一步明确和细化，确保罪责刑相适应、罚当其罪、刑足制罪。
